channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: TMC - Defects - Other FW6 Surface problem, 22nd September
item.description:
GIVE AND TAKE PLUS TEMPORARY FOOTWAY CLOSURE FOOTWAY 28 day ABRUPT LEVEL DIFFERENT 1500X100X25MM CONCRETE FILLET AROUND CATV COVERS STATS REQUIRED (FW6 Abrupt Level Differences)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Post or sign leaning slightly (less than 20 degrees) problem, 22nd September
item.description:
Damaged street name plate sign lose an rocking over footway made safe in grass verge with top soil on a 2 hour
Report on FixMyStreet
